name: 語言與大腦
description: 這門課程主要是簡介語言與大腦的關係。學生可以學習到(1)大腦的基本知識、(2)語言表徵與處理以及(3)認知神經科學的研究方法。學生也將有機會探索當代一些有趣的主題。
goals: To learn basics of the brain and the basic concepts and methods in linguistics and cognitive neuroscience
To learn how language is represented in the brain, and how it is processed between the ears and the brain, and between the brain and the mouth/hands.
syllabus:
This course is an introduction to the relationships between language and the brain. You will learn basics of the brain and the basic concepts and methods in linguistics and cognitive neuroscience. You will also learn how language is represented in the brain, and how it is processed between the ears and the brain, and between the brain and the mouth/hands. You will also explore several topics of current interest.
